headline: Is it the same as Java?
text: Although Java and JavaScript are similar in name, syntax, and respective standard libraries, the two languages are distinct and differ greatly in design.

headline: Is it popular?
text: JavaScript is the world’s most popular programming language, so yes.

headline: Is it only for web development?
text:
Let’s have a look at all of the cool things that YOU can do with JavaScript: 
 -Animate Websites 
 -Make Phone Apps 
 -Make Serverless Websites 
 -Make Games 
 -Flying Drones
